A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not perfect\, this movie is very much a star wars movie. As a big fan of the series it is refreshing to be told \"everything you thought is completely wrong.\" All I can say is wow and I need to see it again to place in rank. If may be anywhere in the top 5 for me. It could be just above the prequels\, or it could be #1. It really is decisive but I know I enjoyed it thoroughly as a movie and as the next chapter in this saga. I can't wait for 9
